page.title: 06COMMUNITY HEALTH
page.content: {Oughtibridge}has a health centre which is situated next to the library in the centre of the village. There is a district nurse, a baby clinic,a health visitor and a group practice. Ante-natal services are catered for at the centre. {Wharncliffe Side,}being so near Oughtibridge,does not have a doctor in the village,most people using the health centre at Oughtibridge. The centre also provides a home help service to those in need,mainly the elderly. There is no dental practice in Oughtibridge or Wharncliffe Side.
